name: Celebratory Kite: Successive Prosperity
description: A kite with a ricefish pattern made of bamboo, paper, and other such materials that can be seen at kite stalls during the Lantern Rite festival. In Liyue, fish are associated with wealth and abundance, so fish-patterned kites are practically the most popular type of kite. If you want to fly one during Lantern Rite, you may need to book well in advance...
